name: Bellinzona e Alto Ticino
description: A region known for its medieval castles and alpine landscapes. The area offers hiking trails, cultural events, and historical sites.

name: Lugano e Dintorni
description: A vibrant city on the shores of Lake Lugano, offering a mix of urban culture and natural beauty. Known for its Mediterranean climate and palm-lined promenades.

name: Locarno e Lago Maggiore
description: A picturesque region on the shores of Lake Maggiore, known for its mild climate, beautiful gardens, and the annual Locarno Film Festival.
